channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - priorities

item.title: Using multiple priorities with modules
item.description: One of the new features of the 2.4 SELinux userspace is support for module priorities. The idea is that distributions and administrators can override a (pre)loaded SELinux policy module with another module without removing the previous module. This lower-version module will remain in the store, but will not â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
